Articles.Content:
False. It's my fourth language.

The person below me has coded at some point of their life (I'll include shellscripts. )

True. Programming I final monday. (C++)

The next user is in college.

True.

The user below me will answer in hex.

False. Mostly because I don't feel like going through all the work to translate a post into hex.

The next user will think that I am lazy.

False. Unless you call me lazy.

The user below thinks I am lazy.
False, the User below me is a cat

False. As I have stated many times. I am an Aperture Science Artificial Personality Construct.

The user below me knows what I am talking about.

False, you're a cat, deal with it.

The user below is a seal.

False. Your name is unpronouncable.

The user below me cannot pronounce his name.

False. Rock-cool-e. Shut up about the 'e'.

The user below me is not a cat.(ROLF you are a cat)

True. Anyway, Rock-Cool-E is not considered a correct pronunciation. You should spell it [Ã‰Â¹Ã‰â€™k.kuÃ‹Âl.iÃ‹Â]. And mine is pronounced [Ã‰â„¢m.Ã‰â„¢m.pi.Ã‰â„¢m.Ã‰â€ºs.Ã‰â€ºf.Ã‰â„¢m.Ã‰â„¢m]. Therefore it can be spelled in phonetics and is pronounceable.

The user below me is scared of Chobit.

Edited May 4, 2013 by MmPMSFmM

False.

The person below me has drawn something Kerbal-related at some point.

False. Why would I spread my bad drawing into the realm of KSP?

The user below me is horrible at drawing like me.

False. Though I'm not the best in the world.

The user below me is currently building a laythe colony.

False. Mun Colony

The user below me is allergic to cheese

False. I "clicked the cheese".

The user below me is a noob.

False. Just rightfully skilled, but not yet fully professional since I haven't successfully launched and landed an SSTO Spaceplane.

The user below me is already a "full professional" by my definitions.

No, I haven't really bothered with SSTO's.

The next user has planted a colony before.

True! My Munbase is doing fine on Laythe, thankyouverymuch.

The person below me has travelled too far by rover.

False. I either timewarp or don't bother with my rovers. Longest trip was 30km on 4x.

The user below me has a Kerbal made object (debris, ship, etc.) on every moon of Jool.

False. I haven't even made it safely to Duna.

The user below me has experience in 3D modelling

True. I will say no more on that matter.

The user below me has a dark evil past.

False. Unless you count being part of GLaDOS. And the shenanigans of being a cat.

The user below me has made more then 7 bases each on a different planet (I have)

False: Only just got into orbit.

The user below me plays Minecraft.

True. But rarely nowadays.

The user below me had a dream about KSP going into 0.20 (I did, woke up and checked my computer but to no avail )
